properties.summary: 1. Little Manila Avenue, Honoring the Filipino community's contributions to NYC. A lasting legacy of thriving in Woodside and providing essential healthcare services during crises.

properties.name: Daniel Andrews Way
properties.summary: 2. Daniel Andrews Way, Recognizing a dedicated civil servant's public service legacy. His impact on Queens through charity work and community involvement endures.

properties.name: Dre’s Way
properties.summary: 3. Dre’s Way, Celebrating a talented athlete's potential cut short by tragedy. Remembered for inspiring peers to achieve their dreams and his dedication to hard work.

properties.name: Jose Miranda, Sr. Way
properties.summary: 4. Jose Miranda, Sr. Way, Commemorating a community-minded entrepreneur's legacy in the South Bronx. His commitment to providing affordable services and supporting local law enforcement lives on through his family.

properties.name: Urban Health Plan Boulevard
properties.summary: 5. Urban Health Plan Boulevard, Honoring the legacy of a community health center dedicated to serving underserved populations. UHP's impact on improving healthcare access and reducing disparities in the Bronx continues to be recognized nationally.

properties.name: Kenneth Casilla Way
properties.summary: 6. Kenneth Casilla Way, Remembering a beloved community leader and mentor in Boerum Hill. His legacy lives on through youth mentorship programs, basketball teams, and efforts to end gun violence in his honor.
